newsitem.title: USA: Olympic Financial extends senior note offer.
newsitem.headline: Olympic Financial extends senior note offer.

text.p: Olympic Financial Ltd said Friday it extended its offer to purchase all of its outstanding 13 percent senior notes due 2000 and the related consent solicitation to 1700 EST March 11.
The offer was originally set to expire on March 6.
Financial and other terms of the offer to purchase and the consent solicitation are unchanged from the terms as previously amended on February 20, 1997.
To date, senior notes totaling about $66.5 million in principal amount have been deposited in the tender offer and have provided consents in the consent solicitation.
The company said it was informed by the dealer-manager that substantial holders will tender their notes and consents prior to the expiration dates, as so extended.
Norwest Bank Minnesota N.A. is serving as depositary for purposes of the offer to purchase and the consent solicitation.
Olympic Financial purchases, sells and services retail installment contracts for new and used automobiles.
